source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_SEQ_00<tab>The Ananta battlemaid is not one to be trifled with.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_SEQ_00<tab>ラールガーズリーチのアナンタ族の闘士は、人を探しているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_000<tab>You look like a ssstrider in sssearch of comrades in need. If ssso, I have a tasssk for you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_000シュー……助力を申し出ると？
素晴らしい……ならば、人探しを頼みたい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_001<tab>I am a trainer, and I was told to expect new recruitsss thisss <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var>, yet nary a one has come. Perhapsss they were given the wrong time or location. I do not know.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_001新兵たちの訓練を受け持っているのだが、
約束の時間を過ぎても、誰ひとりとして、現れぬのだ。
場所を間違えているのか、時間を間違えているのか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_002<tab>They number five in all, these would-be warriors. Sssend them unto me, should you chance to find them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_002シュー……新兵は全部で5名。
見つけたら、急ぎここに来るよう、伝えてほしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER_000_003<tab>With time, I can turn even the most haplesss milksssops into whirlwinds of death. But I cannot do thisss if sssaid farmboys do not come.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER_000_003シュー……新兵は全部で5名。
見つけたら、急ぎここに来るよう、伝えてほしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_SOWASOWAUSOLDIER02637_000_010<tab>Oh bugger, you were sent by the snake, weren't you!? I heard one in four recruits doesn't live through their training. That can't be true, right? Oh bugger, oh bugger...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_SOWASOWAUSOLDIER02637_000_010お、俺のことを探してるだって！？
アナンタ族の訓練は、ことのほか厳しいんだ。
恐ろしいが……生き残るためにも行ってくるよ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_SINGANSOLDIER02637_000_011<tab>Ah. A thousand pardons. So preoccupied was I by the question of whether Ala Mhigo should be a monarchy or republic that I neglected to attend my training. How silly, I know─until we drive the imperials from our lands, the question is moot.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_SINGANSOLDIER02637_000_011アラミゴは王政に戻るべきか、共和制に移行すべきか、
悩むあまり時を忘れていたようだ、直ちに訓練に向かうよ。
帝国軍を追い出さねば、祖国に未来はないのだからね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_BRAVESOLDIER02637_000_012<tab>I know, I know. I'm late. But I had to say a prayer for my sister first. After what the imperials did to her, death was a mercy...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_BRAVESOLDIER02637_000_012早く来るように言われていると？
すみません……若くして、命散らした妹に祈っていたのです。
すぐに集合場所へ向かいますね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_YOUNGSOLDIER02637_000_013<tab>Huh? Training? Gah! I was so busy practicing to impress the others that I completely forgot! Thank you!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_YOUNGSOLDIER02637_000_013呼んでくるように頼まれたって？
おっと、自己鍛錬に夢中で気付かなかったよ。
教えに来てくれて、ありがとなっ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_YANGSOLDIER02637_000_014<tab>The teacher calls for me? I see. We were discussing strategies for disabling magitek armor, you see, and... Ah, yes, of course, there is no time. If you would excuse me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_YANGSOLDIER02637_000_014なに、教官が探してるだって！？
魔導兵器に対する有効な戦略について議論していたら、
時間を過ぎちまったみたいだ……悪いな！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_020<tab>All recruitsss are presssent and accounted for. My thanksss to you, ssstrider.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_020シュー……感謝するぞ。
先ほど、無事に新兵たちがやってきたので、
訓練場に向かわせたところだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_021<tab>Not all appreciate the rigor with which I train my recruitsss. Sssome favor a gentler approach. As if the imperials will be ssso kind.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_021ヒトもアナンタ族も、等しく大切な命だ……。
例え彼らに嫌われようとも、無駄死にせぬように、
厳しく訓練を課し、精強なる狩人へと成長させねばな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_022<tab>'Tis a thanklesss job, to teach, sssome sssay. But I sssay their sssurvival is thanksss enough. Fare you well.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_022シュー……それでは私も行くとしよう。
世話になったな、優しきヒトの子よ。
そなたの狩りに幸あらんことを……。
